Text: It would be awesome if you scene people could half focus on x264 releases and the other half release in xvid for the tv shows.. Guess I'll have to convert this myself, but the audio always goes out of sync by a second which sucks. So I'm hoping you the more experienced uploaders/encoders could do a release in xvid just as soon as the x264 since xvid is a more versatile format. Thanks for the release though! :D
